Author: genomskinligt
Text: yeah that sounds like a good agreement. it would mean that i’d have to tell her about my issues (otherwise it would probably just sound like ”hey shut up”) but maybe that would be for the better... thanks!

Author: spankyzgazpacho
Text: When I was at my worst I decided to cut ties with other ppl with EDs for my and their sake. It helped.  Now that I'm better (started recovery at 16 and I'm 22 now. I've had ups and downs but overall recovered), I have an agreement with one of my best friends who also struggles that we don't talk about EDs, and when we do we leave out triggering details (weight, calories, specific food, among some others). If one of us crosses the line the other informs that we need to stop the conversation there.  Any of these two things might help you and her out.
